pr_title: fix for nerfed slime mobs splitting (#3930)

timeline.bodyText: Wrong patch for this; this isn't related, and should be its own patch.
timeline.author: Proximyst
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3,6 +3,7 @@ From: Zach Brown <zach.brown@destroystokyo.com>
 Date: Tue, 1 Mar 2016 13:24:16 -0600
 Subject: [PATCH] Allow nerfed mobs to jump and take water damage

timeline.bodyText: small nitpick but approving, can we get rid of the line removal
timeline.author: aikar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@
+From 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000 Mon Sep 17 00:00:00 2001
+From: Jake Potrebic <jake.m.potrebic@gmail.com>
+Date: Mon, 24 Aug 2020 08:39:06 -0700
+Subject: [PATCH] Fix nerfed slime when splitting
+
+
+diff --git a/src/main/java/net/minecraft/server/EntitySlime.java b/src/main/java/net/minecraft/server/EntitySlime.java
+index e99fd88118a75f36cb93d02aa7c6029bcffd5f10..1422a927ad6ada9dfcb43be85d634f90ea5ff3b5 100644
+--- a/src/main/java/net/minecraft/server/EntitySlime.java
++++ b/src/main/java/net/minecraft/server/EntitySlime.java
+@@ -205,7 +205,7 @@ public class EntitySlime extends EntityInsentient implements IMonster {
+                 if (this.isPersistent()) {
+                     entityslime.setPersistent();
+                 }
+-

timeline.message: fix for nerfed slime mobs splitting
fix for nerfed slime mobs splitting
